DOC.brief_summary: The Summer Electronic Benefit Children ( SEBTC ) demonstration provide food assistance household school-aged child summer electronic benefit transfer ( EBT ) procedure use Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program ( SNAP ) Special Supplemental Nutrition Program Women , Infants Children ( WIC ) program . The evaluation design include two component : impact study implementation study . The evaluation assess impact SEBTC child 's food security nutritional status , household food expenditure purchase behavior , parental perception , participation nutrition assistance program . The implementation study analyze SEBTC use pattern use administrative data , describe demonstration implementation cost .
DOC.brief_title: The Evaluation Summer EBT Children Demonstration
DOC.detailed_description: The SEBTC evaluation take place summer 2011 2014 . Ten grantee implement demonstration total 16 site ; number participate site and/or evaluation component differ year . In 2011 , 5 grantee five site participate evaluation include implementation cost analysis , EBT analysis , impact study . In 2012 , 10 grantee implement SEBTC 14 site evaluation include study component . In 2013 , four grantee six site participate study component include EBT analysis impact study ( implementation cost data collection ) . Finally , 2014 , three grantee participate three site implementation data collect . Information human subject collect evaluation 's impact evaluation .
DOC.criteria: Households child certify receive National School Lunch program School Breakfast Program prior school year participate site , Summers 20112013
